duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain a portfolio of profitable roadway and transportation projects serving municipalities and county clients.
Manage Municipal roadway and transportation projects for the company.
Provide planning and design to local county and municipal clients in the Biloxi, Mississippi region.
Project management, sub-consultant coordination, and contract scope and fee development/negotiations.
Geometric design for roadways/intersections, drainage design, construction sequencing, and utility relocation coordination.
Assist in the production of proposals, letters of interest, and participate in interviews and other presentations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in civil engineering from an ABET accredited program, and licensed as a Professional Engineer (PE) in the state of Mississippi, or ability to obtain reciprocity within six (6) months.
